header.title: wxMultiChoiceDialog

description.p: This class represents a dialog that shows a list of strings, and allows the user to select one or more.
This class supports the following styles:
This class is derived (and can use functions) from: wxDialog wxTopLevelWindow wxWindow wxEvtHandler

func.fsummary: Constructor taking an array of wxString (not implemented in wx) choices.

desc.p: Constructor taking an array of wxString (not implemented in wx) choices.
Remark: Use wxDialog:showModal/1 to show the dialog.

func.fsummary: Returns array with indexes of selected items.

desc.p: Returns array with indexes of selected items.

func.fsummary: Sets selected items from the array of selected items' indexes.

desc.p: Sets selected items from the array of selected items' indexes.
